storyInfo: Cecelia takes the first step on the path she decides for herself. Who can say how far she will go? Regardless, she has already found her first ally and friend.

attributes.content: Oh, Ezell, good morning! Off to work?
attributes.name: Cheerful Neighbor

attributes.content: Good morning. I don't... have work today. I'm taking a couple days off.
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Up so early on your day off? And look at you frowning like that. Is something bothering you? Getting bullied at the Notarial Hall?
attributes.name: Cheerful Neighbor

attributes.content: I told you, it may look like a decent place to work, but it's total misery over there!
attributes.name: Cheerful Neighbor

attributes.content: Hahaha...
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Here, Ezell, I just bought some cupcakes. Take some. Let your worries go!
attributes.name: Cheerful Neighbor

attributes.content: It doesn't matter if work is bothering you. It's just a job. Don't think about it on your day off! Besides, aren't you still a trainee? If the ceiling caves in, it's gonna crush all your bosses up top before it ever reaches you. Don't make it so hard on yourself.
attributes.name: Cheerful Neighbor

attributes.content: Cheer up! It's not worth getting upset over!
attributes.name: Cheerful Neighbor

attributes.content: Not worth it, huh?
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Still letting it bother you? Haha, anyway, I'mma get going.
attributes.name: Cheerful Neighbor

attributes.content: Thanks for the cupcakes.
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: It's an early morning that couldn't be more normal. Hardly anyone on the streets yet.
But it shouldn't take much longer for the crowds to form and the usual hustle and bustle to return.
This is exactly what... Lateran life is.
How about a crepe?
No thanks... I've got these cupcakes...
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: It's you?!
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: The crepe shop on the corner there only sells two hundred of their signature crepes each day. You need to get up early to have a chance at buying one.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: Thankfully, their hours haven't changed.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: What are you doing here?
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: I'm out for a walk.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: In a city that has an arrest warrant out for you?
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Sure.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: What happened to the people at the Ecclesia Requietum?
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: They're all in a safe place. Once everything is over, they'll leave Laterano with me.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: Where to?
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Who knows.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: Are you going to take Cecelia with you?
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: No, she left.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: H-How did you...?
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: She has something she must do. It may seem trivial right now...
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: But she's found her path, and she will continue down it, overcoming obstacles we could never overcome, treading into predicaments that we wouldn't dare to face, and making it to faraway places that we could never imagine.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: What are you talking about?
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Relax, Brother Ezell. She's far more brilliant than you and I could ever dream to be.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: But she might need you.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: Why me? I'm nothing special.
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: This is pretty embarrassing to say, but I was playing hero in front of her the whole time. I told her my word is my bond, and I wouldn't mind losing my job...
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: But after I got home last night, I spent the whole night freaking out about everything that happened.
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: A mixed-blood Sankta, a fallen angel, a Legatus, the conference at the Basilica, the Sarkaz, and a strange heretical group...
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: How did I get mixed up in all this?
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: I thought I just wanted a decent job. A desk job would be all the better. I would go to work and leave on time, live a quiet, peaceful life... I figured that'd be pretty good for me.
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Everything that happened the last couple days could be just like an interlude. I should count myself as lucky for being able to get away from it all before it's too late, and in a couple decades, I can tell stories about it to my friends...
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: That'd be a pretty solid life, wouldn't it?
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Maybe I shouldn't even be talking to you right now... I should just turn and run.
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Aren't you going to run, then?
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: There's no need to fool yourself.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: How am I supposed to know... what it is that I really want?
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: You and Cecelia both asked the same question.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: She asked you that too?
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Phrased a little differently.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: And how did you answer?
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: I told her a story.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: Suddenly feeling like I shouldn't listen to you...
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Why?
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: I just get the sense that you know how to influence people. What if you're about to sucker me into something here?
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: As long as you don't want to, you won't be.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: That sounds awfully sketchy...
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: I'm here only to give you a message.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: What comes next is for you to decide.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: Cecelia is going to the old bell tower.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: What is she doing there?
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Saying her goodbyes.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: Is something wrong?
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: Oh, Cecelia, aren't you scared, walking the streets all by yourself this early in the morning?
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: Where are those friends of yours?
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: Guide, it's Oren.
attributes.name: Patia

attributes.content: No matter. We'll see what he's planning first.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: There is something I need to do here.
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: You're so little, but you have lots of big ideas going around in your head, huh?
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: I really don't get what that guy is thinking, but... sorry, little girl. I can't let you go.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: Are you taking me to the Basilica?
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: The Basilica? No, no, Cecelia. I can't let you go to the Basilica.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: As long as you don't go to the Basilica and the old man, you can go anywhere.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: At first, I thought it wouldn't be so bad if Andoain took you away. He's had a change of heart, but it's no biggie. I'll do it myself.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: It would be bad if I go to the Basilica?
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: It's hard to say, Cecelia. Hard to say.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: You're actually really important to me, you know? Feoria and I were friends... a long time ago, but still...
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: Anyway, your very existence is much more useful than whatever it is you're thinking up in your little brain. If we put you to good use... you could be the greatest danger to Lateran City in a long time.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: After all, you're a Sarkaz, but you also became a Sankta.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: I don't really want to put Laterano in danger, but I need some leverage that can influence things... a bargaining chip that I can use in a deal.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: And you could be such a precious bargaining chip. I wouldn't want to see you lose your effectiveness over a tiny, little threat.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: I don't understand what you're saying.
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: You don't need to understand, Cecelia. I'm just trying to show you I'm sincere. I won't do anything to get you hurt. I'm never one to resort to violence, if peace is an option.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: It doesn't matter what you want to do. Not now.
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: Could you move out of the way? I'm going to that bell tower.
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: Grr...
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: Didn't you hear? She wants you to get out of her way.
Mister Ezell! You came!
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: Yes, Cecelia. I promised to help you find your mama and be there when you said goodbye to her, right?
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Aww. This is so touching. A mixed-blood girl between a rock and a hard place, with an executor who's true to his word... Am I watching the Lateran soap opera of the year? Makes me want to clap for you two.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: But uh, if I could, I would rather not be the villain here. This is no fun.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: Ngh!
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Mister Ezell!
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: Sankta can't point our guns at our own kind, but violence comes in other forms. So that's no hill to die on, right?
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: Now! Cecelia, go! The bell tower is straight ahead!
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: But...!
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: I'll promise you one more thing—I'll be fine!
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Alright...
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: I'll wait for you at the top, Mister Ezell.
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: Very nice. You came prepared, huh? I didn't expect you to be able to hold me here.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: But still, even if I don't like screwing around with empathy, I can feel the fear in you.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: Save it.
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Have you ever considered that we might be walking the same road here?
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: We're definitely not right now, at least.
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Show me what you've got, then.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: Have you even realized the weight of the burden you're trying to shoulder?
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: Can that trainee executor really hold Oren there?
attributes.name: Patia

attributes.content: Oren's not taking this seriously, and Ezell isn't a Notarial Hall executor right now... He's not actually an obstacle to Oren.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: Actually... Guide, while I would never go against your decisions, I can't say I really agree with this...
attributes.name: Patia

attributes.content: Cecelia should stay with the Pathfinders. It's not only for us, but for her sake too.
attributes.name: Patia

attributes.content: That isn't my decision. I can't decide her fate. This is a decision that only Cecelia can make for herself, Patia... Perhaps we should call it an honor to show her the choices before her.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: Don't worry. What I must do remains the same.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: *gasp*... *gasp*...
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Kid, for an executor in training, you aren't half bad.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: I... I'm still standing...
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Looking to spend some time in the hospital, huh? I'm not out here to break bones, though.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: You don't have to do this. You're just a normal guy living in Lateran City. Go home, lead a happy life. Munch on some cake or take a sip of tea, whatever.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: I've made up my mind already.
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: You folks really like talking about choices and decisions, huh? Has it ever crossed your mind that there's a price to pay when you make decisions?
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: This was only going to be an insurance policy, but well... Sorry, fellas, I need your help.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: We aren't here to help you, Oren. We're doing this because we think it's the right thing to do.
attributes.name: Pathfinder Messenger

attributes.content: So what do you say? 'A wise man adapts himself to circumstances.'
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: Oh, that's a Yanese idiom, you see. It means...
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: Too bad, Ezell...
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: *Sigh*...
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: Federico!
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Trainee Executor Ezell Pastore, you're being temporarily recalled. Your leave has been canceled. Please assist me with this arrest.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Oren Argiolas, your identity has been confirmed. The Seventh Tribunal has revoked your credentials as a Legatus. Please stop resisting and proceed with me to the First Tribunal.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Must I? I still have lots of work to take care of.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: Yes, you must.
attributes.name: Federico
